title: Michael Flynn's Lame Defense & Stormy Daniels's Pricey Legal Setback | Jennifer Lopez
itunes:title: Michael Flynn's Lame Defense & Stormy Daniels's Pricey Legal Setback | Jennifer Lopez
description:
A judge orders Stormy Daniels to pay President Trump's legal fees, Neal Brennan takes aim at popular beliefs, and Jennifer Lopez discusses "Second Act" and "Limitless."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
